info.+content: The new transfer student, Taro Yamada, always uses a big-sized bento box and because of this, is given the nickname of "Dokaben". He joins the school baseball team and meets some of the members, Iwaki and Tonoma. Time has passed and they are now in the high school baseball team. A new member, Satonaka, has joined them and the four of them are well-known in the baseball arena, being the Four Heavenly Kings of the baseball team. They have been entering numerous matches, meeting a variety of adversaries and honing their baseball skills in the process, awaiting in the meantime, for the strongest competitor to appear.
#1: "Ganbare Dokaben" (がんばれドカベン) by Kourogi '73
#2: "Hachinin no March" (九人のマーチ) by Suginami Jidou Gasshou-dan
#3: "Seishun Fever (Combat March)" (青春フィーバー（コンバット・マーチ) by Ichirou Mizuki, Isao Sasaki, Mitsuko Horie, Kumiko Ousugi, Kumiko Kaori, Kourogi '73
#1: "Ah Seishun yo Itsumademo" (ああ青春よいつまでも) by Kourogi '73
#2: "Kimi Koso Minna no Idol da!" (きみこそみんなのアイドルだ!) by Kourogi '73, Suginami Jidou Gasshou-dan
#3: "Taiyou no Ko" (太陽の子) by Columbia All Stars
ドカベン | 作品紹介 | NIPPON ANIMATION

title.+content: I am Taro, nice to meet you.
otoko iwaki no happa ga yureru !
SANMA no aji ga me ni shimiru DE !
otoko no namida wa atsui no desu !
o-yo ! PICCHAA de shi ban ZURA ka ?
demashita ! hi da hakuchou no mizuumi
dono uma ! hana no WARUTSU de kattobase
aa hana no yakyuubu dai PINCHI !
otoko ga naita ! yoi dore NOKKU
mita ka ! otoko iwaki no aku tama uchi
kyou da kumo ryuu ! DORAGONKIRU tai
chiisa na kyojin tsui ooki na kyojin
omoi wa akogare no koushien e
oosaka tsuutenkaku no sakata sankichi ya
natsu no koushien ! doudou no nyuujou koushin
mita ka kyoui no tsuutenkaku dahou

junkesshou ! satonaka tsui tosa maru sakusen
ame ! satonaka fukuchou kesshou no MAUNDO e
tsukame shinku no dai yuushou hata
dai yuushou hana no PAREEDO wo okkakero
dono uma sakkyoku hi da ( hakuchou no mizuumi )
tsuyoshi tama gou da ! futari no DOKABEN
hi tou HAGE yama no ichiya ! zura
zenryaku !? domon no hoshu wa BOKU desu
kesshou ! tetsujin domon tsui chiisa na kyojin
tooi kono itten ! honrui shishu da !
saien ! hi da ( hakuchou no mizuumi ) zura
tsuuretsu ! PICCHAA ga eshi no katateuchi
hashire yamada ! HOUMU wa soko da !
saishuukai ! aa tsuukon no dai ERAA
kieta ? shinku no dai yuushou hata
kinou no tomo wa kyou no teki
shougai no RAIBARU da ! yamada tarou
hougan touhou ! omoi sono sa itten
korezo dono uma no hi da " kuroda fushi "
dono uma !G senjou no ARIA zura
takaku hibike ! harunatsu ni renpa no MAACHI
yamada tsui ( naka ) ! nihon'ashi no KAKASHI
doigaki sakusen ! manrui ni keien wa nai !
junkesshou ! sakushi tokugawa meikun wo nomu
satonaka fushou ! meikun PINCHI mushi manrui
meikun . tosa maru ! saido no kessen
ude ga nobiru ?! kaiki toushu inugami
shinigami BOURU ! yamada wo osou gekitsuu
miseru zo ! chiisa na kyojin no kokoroiki
hi ( maruhi ) shuunen ! dono uma FAITO no nazo
harunatsu renpa no enbukyoku ! hi da ( wakare )
mamoreru ka ! meikun nihon no yuushou hata
otoko iwaki ! waga seishun ni kui nashi
ninkyou yakyuu michi ! nankai ken hidari nanyo
mita ka nagisa ! MITTO no nazo
meikun ! kizu darake no shunki taikai
yosen kaimaku ! datou meikun no aikotoba
hashire satonaka ! eikou no MAUNDO e
NETTO ura ! tachiatta chiisa na kyojin
shiranui touban ! dono uma fukki zura
akuryou ! fuki areru ken hidari senpuu
donsoku DOKABEN ! kesshi no hon tou ( HOUMUSUCHIIRU )
kai ashi B . T ( BURUU . TOREIN ) gakuen ! nazo no donkou PUREI
benkei tatsu ! yokoku toukyuu no nazo
meikun ! koushien sanrenpa e aka RANPU
meikun yabure ruka ! dotan ba no gekitotsu
